vulnerability_findings.name: Reentrancy bug
vulnerability_findings.vulnerability_code: require(msg.sender.call.value(amountToWithdraw)()); // Send the amount to the user

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in Reentrancy_secure.withdrawBalance (patch_2.sol#9-16):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(msg.sender.call.value(amountToWithdraw)()) (patch_2.sol#14)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- locked (patch_2.sol#15)
